title: How to Create a Hero Game Character

steps.headline: Collect a Key from a Chao Box in Story Mode (if you wish to create a Hero Chao, collect a Key as Sonic, Tails, or Knuckles).
steps.description: To collect the key, locate a blue box with a Chao on it and break it open. Pick up the key in the same manner that you would pick up a ring and continue the level.

steps.headline: When you complete the level, you will be brought to the Chao Garden.
steps.description: Enter by going straight. Inside, you will find two eggs. You can hatch them in one of three ways: you can pick the Egg up and shake it by holding the Control Stick left or right, by waiting until they hatch, or by throwing them against a wall (not ideal).

steps.headline: Interact with your Chao.
steps.description: Hold her, pet her, and give her Chaos Drives and Animals. Make sure that you are using Sonic, Tails, or Knuckles when doing so; otherwise, you won't end up with a Hero Chao.

steps.headline: If you have followed all steps correctly, your Chao should be turning lighter.
steps.description: Once your Chao is white with blue highlights and a blue ball above its head, your Chao is guaranteed to evolve into a Hero Chao if you don't abuse it with a Hero character or don't treat it kindly with a Dark Character.

steps.headline: About three hours after your Chao has hatched and you have been in the Chao Garden with it (not all at once, of course!
steps.description: ), your Chao will enter a cocoon. (HINT: Go up to the cocoon and back up until you can see your Chao inside the cocoon. This may take a few tries, but eventually you will be able to peek into the cocoon and see what your Chao is transforming into.

steps.headline: If you followed all of the steps correctly, you will now have a white Chao with blue highlights, a yellow stomach, and a blue halo.
steps.description: Depending on what Chaos Drives/Animals you gave your Chao as a baby, it may have different traits. There are five types of Hero Chao: Fly, Swim, Run, Power, and Normal. The type described above is Normal.

steps.headline: Congratulations; you now have a Hero Chao, the Hero Garden should now be accessible, and another Egg awaits you!
steps.description: If you would like to create a Dark Chao, follow steps 1-5 using Shadow, Rouge, or Dr. Eggman. If you would like a Neutral Chao, treat your Chao equally with both Hero and Dark characters.

text: Collect a Key from a Chao Box in Story Mode (if you wish to create a Hero Chao, collect a Key as Sonic, Tails, or Knuckles). To collect the key, locate a blue box with a Chao on it and break it open. Pick up the key in the same manner that you would pick up a ring and continue the level. When you complete the level, you will be brought to the Chao Garden. Enter by going straight. Inside, you will find two eggs. You can hatch them in one of three ways: you can pick the Egg up and shake it by holding the Control Stick left or right, by waiting until they hatch, or by throwing them against a wall (not ideal). Interact with your Chao. Hold her, pet her, and give her Chaos Drives and Animals. Make sure that you are using Sonic, Tails, or Knuckles when doing so; otherwise, you won't end up with a Hero Chao. If you have followed all steps correctly, your Chao should be turning lighter. Once your Chao is white with blue highlights and a blue ball above its head, your Chao is guaranteed to evolve into a Hero Chao if you don't abuse it with a Hero character or don't treat it kindly with a Dark Character. About three hours after your Chao has hatched and you have been in the Chao Garden with it (not all at once, of course! ), your Chao will enter a cocoon. (HINT: Go up to the cocoon and back up until you can see your Chao inside the cocoon. This may take a few tries, but eventually you will be able to peek into the cocoon and see what your Chao is transforming into. If you followed all of the steps correctly, you will now have a white Chao with blue highlights, a yellow stomach, and a blue halo. Depending on what Chaos Drives/Animals you gave your Chao as a baby, it may have different traits. There are five types of Hero Chao: Fly, Swim, Run, Power, and Normal. The type described above is Normal. Congratulations; you now have a Hero Chao, the Hero Garden should now be accessible, and another Egg awaits you! If you would like to create a Dark Chao, follow steps 1-5 using Shadow, Rouge, or Dr. Eggman. If you would like a Neutral Chao, treat your Chao equally with both Hero and Dark characters.
